thread.title: A source of magic in the City of Lights
thread.title_full: A source of magic in the City of Lights - Review of Hotel de Londres Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jnpla
title: A source of magic in the City of Lights
text:
The Hotel de Londres Eiffel was absolute perfection. If you are looking for everything you hope a trip to Paris might be...and you prefer your expectations exceeded, this is the place for you. The location is amazing...walking distance to tower, metro, river, Champs Elysee (if you like to walk). The vibe is warm, cozy, easy, romantic. The staff is more like a family, proud of their "home" and eager to share it with you. Breakfast was wonderful -- even if ALL you ate was the warm, crusty, fluffy bread! But the view...the view. To close your eyes -- reluctantly, each night by the glow of the Eiffel Tower, in Paris...formidable!
Room Tip: if you can...get the room with the full view of the tower See more room tips
